title: 50627 Dermoscopy of Nail unit Bowen's disease: a retrospective case series
details: F Xie, K Nightingale, D de Berker - Journal of the American Academy of Dermatology, 2024
abstract: Background: Dermoscopy is an increasingly popular tool and its usefulness in diagnosing broad spectrum of dermatologic conditions is becoming more apparent. Its use to evaluate acquired pigmentary disorders is a growing field of interest. We …
